bibl.title: The Ancient Economy and Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987
bibl.author: Rathbone, Dominic W.

bibl.note: Reviews the economic position of the rural population, the character of ancient economic behaviour, and the nature and scale of Roman taxation.
bibl.seg: Rathbone Dominic W., The Ancient Economy and Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 159-176.
